name: Doberman
description: The Doberman Pinscher is alert, fearless, and intelligent — known for their loyalty and athleticism. With proper training and socialization, Dobermans are gentle, loving family dogs and reliable protectors.

adaptability.description: Dobermans tolerate heat well due to their short coat but may need protection in colder climates. Consider a sweater during winter walks.

diet.title: DIET
diet.mainDescription: Dobermans need a high-protein, muscle-supportive diet rich in healthy fats and minerals to maintain strength and agility.

tips.title: Prioritize lean proteins
tips.description: Choose diets with 25–30% protein to sustain muscle mass and stamina. Chicken, lamb, and fish-based foods are excellent.

tips.title: Support heart & joints
tips.description: Include foods with taurine, Omega-3s, and antioxidants to promote cardiovascular health and strong joints.

tips.title: Avoid fillers & excess carbs
tips.description: Avoid foods with wheat, corn, and soy to reduce digestive stress and maintain lean muscle.

tips.title: Tailor diet to activity level
tips.description: Adjust portion sizes for active or working Dobermans versus indoor pets to prevent under or overfeeding.

training.title: DOBERMAN TRAINING
training.mainDescription: Dobermans are fast learners and highly intelligent. Consistent structure, early socialization, and mental exercise make them obedient and confident companions.

tips.title: Confidence building
tips.description: Expose your Doberman to various people and settings early to build confidence and reduce overprotectiveness.

tips.title: Mental & physical exercise
tips.description: Provide at least 1–2 hours of activity daily—agility drills, obedience games, or jogs to keep them engaged.

grooming.title: GROOMING
grooming.subtitle: Dobermans have a short coat that’s easy to care for. Regular brushing and hygiene checks maintain a clean, glossy appearance.
grooming.mainDescription: Dobermans have a sleek, short coat that sheds minimally. Routine grooming keeps them looking sharp and healthy.

tips.title: Weekly brushing
tips.description: Use a soft brush weekly to remove loose hair and enhance shine.

tips.title: Skin & nail care
tips.description: Wipe down with a damp cloth between baths, trim nails regularly, and check ears weekly for cleanliness.
